entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Haliburton

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
